data.message:
Finding the fun in the barrage of lame quotes from players and coaches at Minnesota Vikings training camp.

#Vikings #VikingsCamp

http://www.dailynorseman.com/2015/8/3/9091395/sound-and-fury-signifying-nothing

August 3-Up at 4:36 A.M-5376 Jump Rope-2 Sets-5057!!!!I knew I would break 5000-Glad it happened today-5:57 A.M-6:39 A.M-603 NFL Ladder drills-5:35 A.M-5:47 A.M-Routes vs Air-9:29 A.M-9:52 A.M-Sprints-Bike-Cone-Extra Ladder Drills-Abs-Done at 11:18 A.M-Going to be talking to arena teams tomorrow see where they stand..Want so much to drop my things off with Vikings...But one day at a time-Hardest day of week is always Tuesday..But great start to the month over weekend and Great start to week-5057!!!Feet felt great-I feel like I make my own luck with what I'm doing and to be honest age is just a number to me..Looking to overcome coaches and scouts history or stereotype-I know I can and will do this with the right team-Hanging Tough-Stating Hungry-SEAN MALAFRONTE-ELMONT-NEW YORK➕⛪️

August 3-Up at 4:36 A.M-5376 Jump Rope-2 Sets-5057!!!!I knew I would break 5000-Glad it happened today-5:57 A.M-6:39 A.M-603 NFL Ladder drills-5:35 A.M-5:47 A.M-Routes vs Air-9:29 A.M-9:52 A.M-Sprints-Bike-Cone-Extra Ladder Drills-Abs-Done at 11:18 A.M-Going to be talking to arena teams tomorrow see where they stand..Want so much to drop my things off with Vikings...But one day at a time-Hardest day of week is always Tuesday..But great start to the month over weekend and Great start to week-5057!!!Feet felt great-I feel like I make my own luck with what I'm doing and to be honest age is just a number to me..Looking to overcome coaches and scouts history or stereotype-I know I can and will do this with the right team-Hanging Tough-Stating Hungry-SEAN MALAFRONTE-ELMONT-NEW YORK➕⛪️

Playing "Vikings" in the yard with my 4.5 and 1.5 year old. As 4.5 year old just kicked the ball, she said, "Now kicking for the team Stacy Steinhagen!"

August 3-Up at 4:36 A.M-5376 Jump Rope-2 Sets-5057!!!!I knew I would break 5000-Glad it happened today-5:57 A.M-6:39 A.M-603 NFL Ladder drills-5:35 A.M-5:47 A.M-Routes vs Air-9:29 A.M-9:52 A.M-Sprints-Bike-Cone-Extra Ladder Drills-Abs-Done at 11:18 A.M-Going to be talking to arena teams tomorrow see where they stand..Want so much to drop my things off with Vikings...But one day at a time-Hardest day of week is always Tuesday..But great start to the month over weekend and Great start to week-5057!!!Feet felt great-I feel like I make my own luck with what I'm doing and to be honest age is just a number to me..Looking to overcome coaches and scouts history or stereotype-I know I can and will do this with the right team-Hanging Tough-Stating Hungry-SEAN MALAFRONTE-ELMONT-NEW YORK➕⛪️
Anyone else besides me excited for the return of football?  Maybe this will be our year!  #Vikings

August 3-Up at 4:36 A.M-5376 Jump Rope-2 Sets-5057!!!!I knew I would break 5000-Glad it happened today-5:57 A.M-6:39 A.M-603 NFL Ladder drills-5:35 A.M-5:47 A.M-Routes vs Air-9:29 A.M-9:52 A.M-Sprints-Bike-Cone-Extra Ladder Drills-Abs-Done at 11:18 A.M-Going to be talking to arena teams tomorrow see where they stand..Want so much to drop my things off with Vikings...But one day at a time-Hardest day of week is always Tuesday..But great start to the month over weekend and Great start to week-5057!!!Feet felt great-I feel like I make my own luck with what I'm doing and to be honest age is just a number to me..Looking to overcome coaches and scouts history or stereotype-I know I can and will do this with the right team-Hanging Tough-Stating Hungry-SEAN MALAFRONTE-ELMONT-NEW YORK➕⛪️

The Daily Norseman's Jackson McIntire shares his notes from Minnesota Vikings training camp and talks with safety Harrison Smith.

#Vikings #VikingsCamp

http://www.dailynorseman.com/2015/8/3/9090395/jackson-mcintires-camp-notes-and-harrison-smith-interview

What're your thoughts?
Vikings use a photo of Adrian Peterson and his son to promote the team's Family Day in training camp.

I think it's smart, it lets AP know the team is behind him in rebuilding his image and reputation and let's the world see a good moment with his child instead of the bad one the media made sure everyone saw
Dear World, the Minnesota Vikings think you're all idiots.

So he was found guilty yes, but does that mean he doesn't love his kid. Does that mean they are no longer family. They didn't set up that pic it happend looks like a beautiful moment to me. Leave it to the media and idiots on the Internet to think they know everything and make a negative out of everything and anything. The man messed up no doubt about it, but doesn't he get a second chance, can't he still be a good father? If you have never messed up then u can talk shit, but that's no one so shut up.

Why is this a bad thing? He loves his kid, he made a mistake, nothing more. It's a different culture he was brought up in. It doesn't make it right but where he grew up what he did is an everyday occurrence.
Lol is all I got to say to all you parents raising kids with no work ethic and a bad attitude because you thought taking a phone away for a day was punishment
Let's stop beating this to death and abusing Adrian's reputation, maybe it was too late to switch to a different player??
Thats funny.
He's a child abuse bitch.

Not an AP fan, I think it blows that he lost a year of his career and reputation is killed. All because he took a switch to his kid. While kromer only got 6 games for actually punching a kid, and threatening the parents. Great job NFL!!!
This post is tasteless. Many a kids got a switch to the back side and kissed by said parent, grand parent shortly afterward. More kids today could use a good switch'in.
I think AP should run for president
Please get off AP's nuts, HAY-ZEUS!
lmao
Hi James Wagner
The Minnesota Vikings offensive lineman is ready to learn an entirely new position.
If the o-line can get it together this year and give Teddy some time and A.P. some holes, it will be a great year.
First week of training camp is in the books. Here's who impressed. And who didn't...
Everyone has to be offended by something. Give it a rest.
There's always a problem but you know what's crazy? It seems like people spend more time focusing on other people instead of focusing on what they have on their plate.
When did we as a country become so butt-hurt that we get offended by every little thing?  #GiveItARest!
People have nothing better to do than complain 👊👊
wow... so now we are offended by loving your child after beating your child.
So because he punished his kid, that means he doesn't love him and isn't family. This country is a bunch of crying butt hurt people.
He's not harvesting dead babies like Planned Parenthood, he just kissed his son!
it was family day..peterson is the vikings star player...what's the problem here?? the morality police need to focus on their own lives

It's the media that is the problem with this world. You guys take anyone you can get and rip them to pieces. Shame on you! Adrian Peterson is a great guy who went a little to far but he realizes his mistakes and has moved on and so have we. Maybe you guys should give it a try and report a real story!
Get over it people.  He kissed his son.  And??  Find a real issue to get upset about.  Really.
Everyone deserves a second chance. Hopefully he learned from his mistakes. Need to move on, and this is coming from a bears fan.
this is the PC world we live in folks, ridiculous. Can we please go back to the "stick and stones" world i grew up in? Pretty please?
He's paid for his past mistake. Let's move on.
Our country's in trouble. No other countries should fear us. We are imploding from the inside. #everythingisoffensive  #growupamerica
That's right up there with Riley Cooper being chosen for February in the Philadelphia Eagles calendar.

So for the rest of his life any love he shows for his kids will be scrutinzed. You complain when he switched them, now that he is trying to show the love he may have for them you complain. Grow as set people and stop being so hurt or offended by everything that you do not agree with.
Give it a rest fox sports.

Nothing wrong with the picture, get off your high horse people because I'm sure you've done something bad before and you wanted people to drop it. He's only human and he will make bad call's and mistakes just like all of us...
Kissing your son is bad ? Get over it people !  Great pic VIke's
So you're offended when he's a good dad and offended when he's a bad dad? Go find something constructive to so with your time people. It's a beautiful picture. 💜
It's a beautiful picture. Leave him alone
Good morning America.. What are we offended by today?
amen!
Oh now a picture of a father giving his child a kiss...
Did it on purpose
Wasn't the best idea by the Minnesota Vikings.
So a guy can't love his family after facing this type of allegation? As in he can't move forward and learn? Then, in turn, show love towards his sons and daughters without ridicule? I'm confused.
Trash story...leave the guy alone.
Is this the best BS story you can come up with Fox?? Why don't you try reporting real NFL news? And to the idiot that wrote this article, I hope they fire your stupid azz...
This is so stupid, there's nothing wrong with the vikes posting that
I'm a Packer fan....and even I say this is NOT news.  Come on...

This article is classless trash.  Looks like this author is actually the one who made the biggest mistake.  You want to write about someone "fac[ing] backlash," then read the comments on your "article" and feature yourself. 

Go Vikes and welcome back A.P.!
NFL on Fox starting to sound like Fox News... STFU
Adrian Peterson needs to put a bullet in his own head.
People always need to complain about something.
Oh stfu

So you can make a big deal when he's too aggressive about how he disciplines his son but not be happy for him when he's showing love to his son? Leave him alone. He lost another one two years ago because of someone else.
That's fucking dumb.... Just because he disciplined his son doesn't mean he doesn't love his child or have a sense of family.
Fuq you Fox.

Really, FOX sports? Every one has moved on, fans, and most importantly the child and family has moved passed this. So does Fox sports feel it necessary to take a chance and re victimize the kid, and keep dragging this story out? No class at all FOX.

NFL on FOX, really? So he disciplines his child and is vilified for it, whether justified or not. Then he shows his son genuine affection and is vilified for that?  This is what you want to report as news?
New flash: wasn't the best idea by NFL on Fox to post a story about A.P showing his son some love, as a way to reference back to his domestic assault that he did time for.
Smh at NFL on Fox for saying it wasn't a good idea and you guys make it look like he doesn't love his kids

So are we to hold in the house of shame forever ; he did it , Lord knows you the media and the internet "trolls " told us he did it the NFL. fined and suspended him so games for his actions ,all the rest of this is overkill.

All these NFL  Sports News pages are the ones who are shameless. A guy can't love his son? Maybe he crossed a line in the past when disciplining his son but I/m sure it was out of love and maybe he learned from it. NFL Fox,have some class and quit acting like the Tabloid Pages.
Cry babies.  If didn't learn from his mistakes you would crying about that but since is changing his ways he is wrong for kissing his son.  Nothing satisfies you cry babies anymore
Whatever.

to the idiot who wrote this article, let me help you with the research you clearly didn't do before writing this article. the child pictured in the post in question is NOT the child involved in his abuse case. learn to do your job, asshat.
Dislike! Leave the man alone!
Only back lash will be from idiots so who the hell cares lol he beat his kids ass because he loves him
Bs leave him alone

A #Vikings LB competing for a starting role is the focus of this week's Draft Kings Extra Point.

Check it out --> http://bit.ly/1MHSVx5
Hi i am jessica i am 17 year old i live in USA i love making new friends please follow me i will follow you back and inbox you i promise

Hy everyone :-) My name is Ashley :-)  18 years old <3 i m Single & Beautiful <3 girl <3 please like my page :-) in 3 sec and i'll send you a friend request and inbox you <3 you will never regret :-( i promise you  please support me by just 1 like <3  1 like = 1  help  :'(

Owsome post :) my name jennifer gumz :) i'am 18 yrs Old :) Please like my page and also share first picture :) i Will Send You a friend request & inbox u <3 
you will never regret  :(  I promise you :( Please  support me by Just 1 like (y)  <3  <3 (new)

A Minnesota Vikings great passes away. Our condolences to the family of Ross Cooper "Rip" Hawkins.

http://www.dailynorseman.com/2015/8/3/9090709/rip-hawkins-passes-away
Schwickert's is a proud sponsor of 2015 Minnesota Vikings Training Camp. Happy 50 Years!
PHOTOS: Check out some of the sights from Minnesota Vikings Training Camp Week One —> http://bit.ly/1UiR4kv
Not the best decision by Adrian Peterson's Minnesota Vikings.
Adrian Peterson can't celebrate family day? Or is Adrian Peterson any less of a father? Ridiculous that any backlash would be expected. Everyone loves to point fingers and condemn one another.
Every Mexican family saw nothing wrong with what he did it's called discipline making sure your kid doesn't grow up to be a disrespectful asshole
forgiveness
Well... who else do the Vikings have?
Don't the Vikings know that people carry a grudge on forever?? Time to get over it people! I'm not even a Vikings fans! Maybe if it was a repeat thing I could understand.

Backlash is silly.  He made a mistake one time so that means he cant be used for this?  This is just people whining for the sake of it.  I am a Packers fan and I am happy to see Peterson interacting with his son.
There's like 20 kids missing from this picture of Adrian Peterson and his kid(s)
Give the guy a chance to redeem himself God's sake, let the man play football
I think the Vikings are trying to make peterson's image better, and I agree that if he is trying to be a better father, then he's learnt his lesson regarding disciplining his son.  Second chance?
You'll all be alright.

Fuck Adrian Peterson. What he did was not a form of discipline. It was a form of torture. Read what he did before you start standing up for him. He beat him with a switch on the back of his legs his ass and his back. A long with his scrotum (that right folks. The ol' ball bag). And BTW, his son was only 4 years old. 4!!!!! Can't believe people would stand up for this guy. Look at the pics of his child. That was far from ok. I'm ok with spanking. No problem but that is not even in the same ball park as spanking. Disgusting!!!!
Why in the world they decided to do that is beyond me.

SmH That Is Exactly What Is Wrong With This Country. Judge A Man By His Actions As A Father, And How He Was Raised. The Bible Says Discipline Your Children. Maybe If Half Of You Who Judged Him Would Discipline Their Children They Wouldn't Grow Up To Be Disrespectful And Actually Have Respect For Themselves. Adrian Peterson I Applaud What You Did And I Remember Everyone Was Behind You When You Lost Your Younger Son Now They Hate You I Don't Brother!
Oh, shit! Here come the SJWs who think they know what's best for every child!
This was blown out of proportion to begin with. That wasnt child abuse. I got worse ass beating as a kid and it made me a better person
Then they could get the local dentist -hunter and promote wild life day.
I hate social media so damn much.
I guess no one can repent in this world anymore.

I got beaten with a wooden spoon when I did wrong as a child, which was often, it was called parenting back then. I laugh about it now and hold no ill will towards my parents. Would never ask for a different up-bringing. It doesn't mean he loves his family any less than all the critics out there.
Everybody is crying over AP's kid. I'm pretty sure everything between him and his son are fine. Stop trying to tell other's how to raise their children and raise your own

Why? He can't have family? People can't change? I guess if you ever mess up, you might as well end your career, and just go become a hermit somewhere away from society :-/ sad to say forgiveness isn't allowed in this country. No backlash should be had.
Well Duh
not the best decision? he is showing love for his son!
Smfh just ignore it AP welcome back
Fk this page

Saturday was Family Day for the Vikings, who are in training camp in Mankato. 

The organization decided to promote it by sharing a picture on Twitter of Adrian Peterson kissing his son.
AP made a mistake. He owned up to it. Im glad the Vikings and Adrian are able to move on from this. What more does he have to do?
Vikings are showing Adrian they're behind him. As they've said they were all along
Family Day and Adrian Peterson...free sticks!
Bonehead move to promote that with the AP picture. Opening yourselves up for a social media thrashing.
Did he bring 8 kids or 1 ?
Which one?
Dumb. Staged photos.
Nothing like promoting family with a child abuser!! Well Done!!
Mindless sheeple comments...endless procession right off a cliff
Does that mean all those over paid bone heads bring all their past and present wife's and other assorted female add on's to family day?
Kissed him with what ?

Family day lol the guys got how many kids from how many women. Maybe if he paid attention and cared he would have done something before the one was beaten to death by someone else. Besides the beatings he hands out to the ones that actually know him.
propaganda
Quick, someone make a switch joke.  Youll definitely be the first!
How many of his several kids. Came at his expense.  He has so many.
All those kids all those baby mommas perfect guy for family day

As he walks in with a switch ín hand ¡ so just because he “owned " up to it the child will wipe it out of his memory ? Nobody is even concerned about the child, it's all about a.p. and football ! Disgusting Idiot !
Really! And that's gonna make it all better?
The first 500 get free switches 😀
Dustin he beat a child bloody..no excuse!!!
Were sticks handed out in the goodie bags for kids?
Puke
